title: Responsive Portfolio Website
description: A sleek, modern portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fully responsive and optimized for mobile.
author: Alice Kim

title: REST API for E-commerce App
description: Designed and developed a secure RESTful API using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB for a full-featured e-commerce platform.
author: Brian Chen

title: Full Stack Blogging Platform
description: A MERN stack blogging platform with user authentication, markdown support, and post management.
author: Carla Lopez

title: Admin Dashboard UI
description: Interactive admin dashboard built using React, Chart.js, and Tailwind CSS. Includes dynamic charts and filters.
author: Daniel Singh

title: Authentication Microservice
description: JWT-based authentication microservice built in Go, featuring secure user login and token refresh logic.
author: Ella Zhang

title: Event Management App
description: A full-stack app to create, manage, and RSVP to events. Uses React frontend and Firebase backend.
author: Frank Torres
